name: THIMBLE in Warm Oak, Mole 2512
description:
Adorable medium messenger made especially for across the body use, perfect for holding all your essentials! 
Made in quality leather with very raggedy ragtag front edge and leaf applique. Just the right size for a purse, snack, notebook, i phone, camera and fairy keys.... Main large compartment. It closes nice and easily with a fairysteps big egg bead.

name: UK 7, KITTY in Conker
description: Classic Oxfords... Fairysteps style! Perfect for libraries, train journeys and tea parties in castle turrets... Retro vintage inspired shoe with deep curvy quarters, CONKER BROWN uppers with contrasting MARMITE tongue... Ribbons to finish off! Durable, ultra comfortable, all weather, Vibram non slip, cushioned soling comes as standard, and can be easily resoled by your local cobbler as and when the time comes, making this footwear a super eco friendly option! SIZE UK 7 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. Please check your SIZING here. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 6, EDITH Buckled, Polished Nut 2506
description: Shown in POLISHED NUT BROWN leather with a super chunky wedged EVA soling. A vintage inspired buckled Mary Jane with flower applique detailing, made in a timeless colour! { This is a prototype shoe made with a new soling that we have been trying out. It will be initially stiff before it softens and moulds to your foot, so there is a potential of the shoe lifting at the heel (your heel lifting out of the shoe when you take a step)... If you fancy a bargain though, and you are a UK 6, and don't mind trying out the soling, these are for you! } SIZE UK 6 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. Please check your SIZING here. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear. *Once worn, these shoes are not returnable!*

description:
Made in thick supple leather, this beautiful pen case will get better with every passing year! One to keep forever, just like a special pen... 
Designed to fit a nice plump fountain pen!

DIMENSIONS: Width - 4cms, Height - 15cms.

name: YSABEL in Soft Jade 2501
description:
Adorable mini messenger made in quality leather with contrasting applique. Just the right size for a purse, snack, notebook, i phone, camera and fairy keys.... Main large compartment with additional front mobile / ipod pocket to save rummaging for your phone. It closes nice and easily with a fairysteps big egg bead.

DIMENSIONS: height - 18 cms, width - 17 cms, depth - will stretch with use, short fixed length strap approx 85/90cms.

name: FLIP Card Case Wallet 2495
description:
Made in thick, quality supple leather. The FLIP card wallet is set to age perfectly, burnishing itself everyday you use it! Complete with Wren applique to keep you company.
This case holds a surprising amount and would be ideal for cards / notes! Shown holding 16 cards (8 on each side) with use it will give to hold over 20 cards comfortably, keeping them safe and snug.

DIMENSIONS: Fits a back pocket a treat! Width: 11cm, height: 8.5cm, depth: 2cm, stretches with use.

name: UK 5, YIDETH in Pink Dragon
description: Shown in PINK DRAGON leather with our standard cushioned Vibram non slip soling. Very much a Medieval inspired fairytale shoe with off side point, star cut outs, and high insteps, perfect for teaming up with ethereal flowing gowns... Maid Marion would probably have ordered a pair in Sherwood green... This style should be initially snug and is not suitable for wide fittings! SIZE UK 5 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. Please check your SIZING here. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 5, YIDETH in Quink
description:
These shoes have been featured in a magazine photoshoot and have been worn by a model, hence the 50% price reduction! 
They are as good as new apart from a little Bristol soil in the tread!

Shown in QUINK blue black leather, contrasting scarlet insole and contrast stitching, with our standard cushioned Vibram non slip soling. 
With off side point, and high insteps, perfect for teaming up with ethereal flowing gowns... or even your skinnies! This style should be initially snug and is not suitable for wide fittings!

SIZE UK 5 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. 
Please check your SIZING using the link above. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 5, MOONSHINE Pimpernel in Conker, Greenwood
description:
These shoes have been featured in a magazine photoshoot and have been worn by a model, hence the 50% price reduction! 
They are as good as new apart from a little Bristol soil in the tread!

Unique, comfortable, durable... everything a good boot should deliver! We offer Moonshine with Pimpernel leaf applique decoration in CONKER with Greenwood applique work. Complete with rounded toe shape, green satin ribbons to tie and open laced front. A slice of fairy heaven for your feet... Approx height: 30cms.

SIZE UK 5 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. 
Please visit the SIZING page before ordering. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: RIBBLE Hoot 2472
description:
Designed to be the perfect 'take on an adventure' everyday bag... ideal as a study / book bag! This bag is soft and strong - Made to love and last... 
Made in quality COFFEE leather. Antiqued magnetic closure. Large unlined clean interior with large back interior pocket for iphone etc. Long double shoulder straps.

Complete with ribbon tied, matching key fob for cottage keys!

DIMENSIONS: width - 33cms, height - 37cms, Shoulder straps, from top of bag to the centre of the handles when held - 28cms.

name: CLEMMIE Tweet in Lipstick, Meadow 2458
description:
A beautiful vintage inspired handbag made in a LIPSTICK, MEADOW leather outer with complimentary emerald partial lining. A little Tweet will accompany you on your adventures! A bag to keep forever - love forever!

It has double clutch handles and a top security tab with a simple push lock closure (with key) to keep your belongings safe and sound. Interior mobile pocket to avoid potential delving when you urgently need it! Partially lined interior for durability.

The handles have a stiffened core to keep their shape and make them extra comfy to hold. This bag is perfect for jauntily swinging at your side, sort of a handbags alternative to skipping! 
Comes complete with a ribbon tied matching key fob for cottage keys!

DIMENSIONS: Width - 23cms, height - 20cms, depth - 9.5cms at base. Freestanding. Handles, from top of bag to the centre of the handles when held - 17cms.

Warning... other Women will stare, covetously at this bag!

name: MAYBELLE in Lipstick, Meadow 2451
description:
A beautiful vintage inspired large handbag made in a LIPSTICK / MEADOW quality leather outer with Emerald lining. A bag to keep forever - love forever! It looks almost flourescent in the pictures but it isnt! Just a really rich pink and green!
It has double clutch handles and a top security tab with a simple push lock closure (with key) to keep your belongings safe and sound. Large interior mobile pocket to avoid potential delving when you urgently need it! Partially lined interior for durability.

The handles (these are also suitable for shoulder use) have a stiffened core to keep their shape and make them extra comfy to hold. This bag is perfect for jauntily swinging at your side, sort of a handbags alternative to skipping! Suitable for shoulder use. 
Comes complete with a ribbon tied matching key fob for cottage keys!

DIMENSIONS: Width - 33cms, height - 20cms, depth - 9.5cms at base. Freestanding. Shoulder straps, from top of bag to the centre of the handles when held - 24cms.

name: MEG in Lipstick 2421
description:
Made using rich LIPSTICK PINK / MERMAID leather. Unique Rag tag raw edge with Neverland leaf detailing. 
Features 2 Large front pockets for ipods, mobile, purse, etc! 
Fairysteps egg bead wooden closure. Very large, deep main compartment with an unlined, smooth, clean interior. Stitched, wide comfortable strap. 
Leather laced sides for shaping, which can be removed for a wider opening if you fancy!
Complete with matching leafy keyfob to stop the pixies stealing your keys...

DIMENSIONS: Width: 30cm, height: 28cm, depth: 9cm, shoulder strap: (very long, across body) 125cms fixed length. Free standing.

name: SWIPE in Plum Elephant, Mustard 2497
description:
At last, a Fairysteps gizmo case! 
This leather case has been especially designed for a Galaxy S111 but will fit most other similar sized smart phones too! Soft and screen friendly inside, there is nothing sharp or nasty in there to hurt your beloved. Ive left enough room to add a few cards or a bus pass, etc in there too. One to keep forever... 
Large single compartment. 
Push lock closure mounted on a heart shaped applique to show your phone some love x

Dimensions approx: Width: 17cm, height: 9cm, depth: stretches with use, but approx 1cm.

name: SWIPE in Apricot, Lapiz 2496
description:
At last, a Fairysteps gizmo case! 
This leather case has been especially designed for a Galaxy S111 but will fit most other similar sized smart phones too (including iphones)! Soft and screen friendly inside, there is nothing sharp or nasty in there to hurt your beloved. Ive left enough room to add a few cards or a bus pass, etc in there too. One to keep forever... 
Large single compartment. 
Push lock closure mounted on a heart shaped applique to show your phone some love x

Dimensions approx: Width: 17cm, height: 9cm, depth: stretches with use, but approx 1cm.

name: MERRY 2492
description:
Incredibly pretty and practical! This leather purse holds a surprising amount and would make an ideal small clutch. One to keep forever... 
Large single back compartment for coinage and notes, with front pocket for cards, etc. OR pop a phone in the back and coins in the front! Press stud closure.

Dimensions: Width: 15cm, height: 11cm, depth: stretches with use.

name: MER Blossom in Dark Oak, Buttercup, Marmalade
description:

name: CLEMMIE Corsage in Dusky Blue 2456
description:
A beautiful vintage inspired handbag made in a DUSKY BLUE antiqued leather outer with complimentary biscuit full lining. A sumptuous leather layered corsage will accompany you on your adventures! A bag to keep forever - love forever!

It has double clutch handles and a top security tab with a simple push lock closure (with key) to keep your belongings safe and sound. Interior mobile pocket to avoid potential delving when you urgently need it! 

The handles have a stiffened core to keep their shape and make them extra comfy to hold. This bag is perfect for jauntily swinging at your side, sort of a handbags alternative to skipping! 

DIMENSIONS: Width - 23cms, height - 20cms, depth - 9.5cms at base. Freestanding. Handles, from top of bag to the centre of the handles when held - 17cms.

*Warning... other Women will stare, covetously at this bag! Clemmie's are addictive...

name: UK 3, LUNA, Daffodil Leather 2256
description:
These shoes have been featured in a magazine photoshoot and have been worn by a model, hence the 50% price reduction! 
They are as good as new apart from a little Bristol soil in the tread!

Influenced by Mary Janes and dancing shoes of old. LUNA is the essence of Whimsy!! Ribbon detail to keep them firmly placed for skipping and hopscotching. This style is particularly good for high insteps as the ribbons allow adjustment at this point.... Made in DAFFODIL smooth leather with matching organza and polka dot ribbon ties. Cushioned Vibram non-slip soling with a contrasting PISTACHIO nubuck leather insole.

SIZE UK 3 (D) STANDARD WIDTH.
Please check your size using the SIZING link above. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 3, MOTH, Larch green, Peanut butter leather, 1711
description:
These shoes have been featured in a magazine photoshoot and have been worn by a model, hence the 50% price reduction! 
They are as good as new apart from a little Bristol soil in the tread!

This fabulous fairy boot with its long fairy pointy toe, curly points and velvet ribbon decoration is a fairies dream! Equally as lovely with full fairy attire or just your usual togs! 
Made in LARCH GREEN and PEANUT BUTTER antiqued leathers with a matching nubuck leather insole. Beautiful Meadow green velvet ribbons to tie... Gather your wings and head for the woods...

SIZE UK 3 (D) STANDARD WIDTH.
Please check your sizing using the link below. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 5, MOONSHINE Prickle in Quink, Greenwood
description:
Unique, comfortable, durable... everything a good boot should deliver! We offer Moonshine with Prickled leaf applique decoration in QUINK blue black with Greenwood applique work. Complete with the long pointed fairy toe shape and open laced front. A slice of fairy heaven for your feet... Approx height: 30cms.

SIZE UK 5 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. 
Please check your SIZING using the link above. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 5, PEASBLOSSOM Wren in Pink Dragon
description:
These shoes have been featured in a magazine photoshoot and have been worn by a model, hence the 50% price reduction! 
They are as good as new apart from a little Bristol soil in the tread!

Sort of rugged and soft, all at the same time! Vintage inspired, curvy lines, cut away backs, little black Wren on one boots outer quarter, black organza ribbons to lace. Imp side toe. Can be worn fully or partly laced. 

SIZE UK 5 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. 
Please check your SIZING using the link above. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 5, FLUTTERBY in Lime, Wild Plum
description:
Shown in LIME / WILD PLUM leather with our standard cushioned Vibram non slip soling. 
Flutterby Butterfly, Flutterby home... Butterfly accents with ribbon detail perfect for teaming up with spotty tights and petticoats... This style should be initially snug!

SIZE UK 5 (D) STANDARD WIDTH. 
Please check your SIZING using the link above. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: UK 6, MOTH, Deep Sea, Daffodil Leather 2254
description:
These shoes have been featured in a magazine photoshoot and have been worn by a model, hence the 50% price reduction! 
They are as good as new apart from a little Bristol soil in the tread!

Long pointed toes with curly tops and star applique and punch work detailing on the outer quarters. These boot tops are two tone blue with the outer quarters being a slightly lighter shade of blue! Scrump!

Made in 2 blue leathers with DAFFODIL backs and stars and black satin ribbons to tie. Cushioned Vibram non-slip soling with a contrasting PISTACHIO nubuck leather insole.

SIZE UK 6 (D) STANDARD WIDTH, (US 8 - EUR 39).
Actual interior measurements - Length: 26.1 cms - Width: 22.9 cms.

Please check your size using the SIZING link above. Actual interior measurements are shown on our size charts to help customers assess suitability of in stock footwear.

name: HEPZIBAH in Mermaid
description:
Beautiful hip or waist clinching belt made in supple quality leather with ribbon laced detail at the centre back. 
At its narrowest its a lovely deep 5 cm and 7cm at its widest. 
Fully lined with a contrasting soft leather. Solid brass buckle closure with roller which will mellow beautifully with age.

Minimum circumference: 29" 
Maximum circumference: 33"

name: ELEANOR Leather Belt
description:
Bohemian style traditional handmade belt.
This beautiful wide hip belt is made in a Rich Veg Taned leather.
It is 2" / 50mm wide. Edge burnished and perfectly finished, it is set to age beautifully, becoming a faithful companion in your wardrobe.
A quality solid cast, simple, yet wonderful brass buckle closes the belt. 

Measurement - Is adjustable from 29" to 39". Further holes can be made however if it needs to be smaller or larger.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
Treat someone you love to a gift voucher!
Available for 25, 50, 75 and 100

Redeemable against any item in the Fairysteps online shop.
You will be sent a special voucher code within 24 hours of purchase!  Recipients can then add their code at checkout to have the voucher amount discounted from their order.

Simple! Presents sorted!
